content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TMPL_DIMENSION1]
(
    [DIMENSION1_KEY] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[SOURCE2_ID] [int] NOT NULL,
	[NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE1] [nchar](20) NULL,
	[NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE2] [nchar](20) NULL,
	[DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE1] [datetime] NULL,
	[DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE2] [datetime] NULL,
	[DSS_CREATE_TIME] [datetime] NULL,
	[DSS_UPDATE_TIME] [datetime] NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
